subject: enjoy
body:
Mar 23, 2005 - Laser Marking System marks metal and 
plastic parts. System is suited for laser marking products such as fresh produce, 
confectionery, and pharmaceutical tablets.
finds that this calculated utilization of the 
public air waves to promote racial stereotypes, bigotry and hatred through the 
veiled shield of humor is repugnant, and unacceptable to our 
community.
